overview: Samantha Stuard is a scientist who opens a previously unexplored tomb in Egypt where her father vanished nearly 20 years earlier, and she accidentally awakens a 3,000-year-old mummy, named Neferkala, who releases a sexual urge in anyone she comes in physical contact with. Jointed by Samantha, Neferkala embarks on a sexual quest to find her eternal lover Nomron.
title: Curse Eternal
